content.rendered:
[vc_section full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”bottom” fade_in_opacity=”pix-opacity-4″ pix_over_visibility=”” responsive_css=”{“pix_res_sm_mt“:“-120px“}” css=”.vc_custom_1648034801253{margin-top: 100px !important;background-color: #2f529e !important;}” fade_in_intro=”36817″ b_custom_height=”50px”][vc_row pix_particles_check=”” css=”.vc_custom_1647847901902{padding-top: -120px !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1647847880462{padding-bottom: 20px !important;}”]

[vc_single_image image=”35315″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center” css=”.vc_custom_1647845254495{margin-top: 60px !important;}”]

Digiperform Placements

13300+ Freshers Got Placement At Renowned Companies
[vc_empty_space height=”10px”]

Award Winning Digital Marketing Training Institute

[/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_section full_width=”stretch_row” pix_over_visibility=”” css=”.vc_custom_1647845909013{margin-top: 20px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}”][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” pix_particles_check=”” css=”.vc_custom_1647845922853{margin-top: 30px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_column_text]

We’ve always worked very dedicatedly to provide our trainees with the best learning experiences. Digiperform has a strong assurance to provide the best-trained professionals for the corporate world and a winning career for our trainees.

 

We have a team of enthusiastic members, responsible for interfacing with the organization and assisting thousands of students in securing the best placements. 13300+ Fresher Got their 1st Job; With Digiperform Certifications & Over 9000+ Trainees Got Better Career with Average Salary Hike Of 20%

 

Leading organizations preferred Digiperform for their Digital Marketing recruitments.

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1647849780497{padding-top: 30px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/5″]

[vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1647852381975{margin-top: -40px !important;}”]

28,000
JOBS POSTED

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/5″]

[vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1647849742622{margin-top: -40px !important;}”]

3,000
CURRENT JOBS

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/5″]

[vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1658220844350{margin-top: -40px !important;}”]

22,000
PLACEMENTS

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/5″]

[vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1658220922644{margin-top: -40px !important;}”]

13,300
FRESHERS

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/5″]

[vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1658387872422{margin-top: -40px !important;}”]

12,00,000
HIGHEST SALARY (PA)

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”62px”][vc_separator][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” top_divider_select=”5″ pix_particles_check=””][vc_column]

Why to Hire a Digiperformer?
[vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1646308277647{padding-top: 60px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]
[vc_column_text]

Highly Skilled

We impart skills that are required by the industry, through our fully practical innovative and interactive training methodologies.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

[vc_column_text]

Certified

Our trainees are licensed with 15 certifications that are highly valuable in the Digital job market.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

[vc_column_text]

Practically Trained

Our trainees are trained practically. We provide the actual work-life experience during the training program itself.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

[vc_column_text]

Employable & Confident

Our training program makes the students employable by including personality development modules to make them job-ready and build their self-confidence

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_section full_width=”stretch_row” pix_over_visibility=”” top_divider_select=”20″ top_layers=”2″ t_1_color=”#f9f9f9″ t_2_color=”rgba(252,252,252,0.6)”][vc_row pix_particles_check=””][vc_column][vc_single_image image=”33453″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center” css=”.vc_custom_1647846743920{margin-top: 60px !important;}”]

Corporates Clients Hiring Digiperformers Include

Moreover, 10,754+ Fresher Got their 1st Job; With Digiperform Certifications & Over 7548+ Trainees Got Better Salary Hike.
